item.title: 让Remedy飞一会
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: Remedy应用的性能优化是一个在系统建设过程中需要长期关注的问题，而不是在上线的前一天晚上去解决的问题，我也碰到过很棘手的性能问题，它确实

item.title: ARS启动故障修复案例
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: ARS版本 7.6.04 数据库 Oracle11G 和ARS在同一台服务器上 错误现象： ARS服务不能正常启动 arerror.log报 390600 : SQL 数据库不可用 – 将重试连接 (ARNOTE 590) Sat Apr 02

item.title: Remedy ITSM 7.6 installation Tips
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 自从7.6发布和以后一直没有时间安装，通过最近的几次安装，积累了一些经验，供大家参考。在安装开始之前请一定查看ARS_7500_Comp_M

item.title: Install Oracle 10.2.01 on OpenSuSE 10.3
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: A) Download 10201_database_linux32.zip from Oracle website. B) Download 10gR2_openSUSE102_introduction.pdf and ora.rpm from ftp ftp.novelŀcom C) Install Oracle, following quick steps: 1. Install openSUSE 10.2 with “C/C++ Development” selection. 2. Download and Install orarun package. 3. Enable and set password for newly created user oracle by orarun. 4. Set updated kernel parameters by executing /etc/init.d/oracle start. 5. Download and
